translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Upgrading to new versions of React Native has been difficult. You might have seen something like this before:

translations.zh-hant: 升級 React Native 版本向來是個難題。你可能曾遇過類似以下情況：

segments.source_content: ![](/blog/assets/git-upgrade-conflict.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![](/blog/assets/git-upgrade-conflict.png)

segments.source_content: None of those options is ideal. By overwriting the file we lose our local changes. By not overwriting we don't get the latest updates.

translations.zh-hant: 這些選項都不理想。覆寫檔案會導致本地修改遺失，不覆寫則無法取得最新更新。

segments.source_content: Today I am proud to introduce a new tool that helps solve this problem. The tool is called `react-native-git-upgrade` and uses Git behind the scenes to resolve conflicts automatically whenever possible.

translations.zh-hant: 今天我很榮幸介紹一款解決此問題的新工具。該工具名為 `react-native-git-upgrade`，背後運用 Git 技術在可能情況下自動解決衝突。

segments.source_content: ## Usage

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用方式

segments.source_content: > **Requirement**: Git has to be available in the `PATH`. Your project doesn't have to be managed by Git.

translations.zh-hant: > **必要條件**：Git 必須存在於 `PATH` 環境變數中。專案本身不需受 Git 管理。

segments.source_content: Install `react-native-git-upgrade` globally:

translations.zh-hant: 全域安裝 `react-native-git-upgrade`：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ npm install -g react-native-git-upgrade
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3569d545

segments.source_content: or, using [Yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/):

translations.zh-hant: 或使用 [Yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/)：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ yarn global add react-native-git-upgrade
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cb57d798

segments.source_content: Then, run it inside your project directory:

translations.zh-hant: 接著在專案目錄中執行：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ cd MyProject
$ react-native-git-upgrade 0.38.0
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_be2d5397

segments.source_content: > Note: Do **not** run 'npm install' to install a new version of `react-native`. The tool needs to be able to compare the old and new project template to work correctly. Simply run it inside your app folder as shown above, while still on the old version.

translations.zh-hant: > 注意：請**不要**執行 'npm install' 來安裝新版 `react-native`。此工具需比對新舊專案模板才能正常運作。只需在舊版專案目錄中執行上述指令即可。

segments.source_content: Example output:

translations.zh-hant: 範例輸出：

segments.source_content: ![](/blog/assets/git-upgrade-output.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![](/blog/assets/git-upgrade-output.png)

segments.source_content: You can also run `react-native-git-upgrade` with no arguments to upgrade to the latest version of React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 亦可直接執行 `react-native-git-upgrade` 不帶參數，將自動升級至最新版 React Native。

segments.source_content: We try to preserve your changes in Android and iOS build files, so you don't need to run `react-native link` after an upgrade.

translations.zh-hant: 我們會盡量保留你對 Android 與 iOS 建置檔案的修改，因此升級後無需執行 `react-native link`。

segments.source_content: We have designed the implementation to be as little intrusive as possible. It is entirely based on a local Git repository created on-the-fly in a temporary directory. It won't interfere with your project repository (no matter what VCS you use: Git, SVN, Mercurial, ... or none). Your sources are restored in case of unexpected errors.

translations.zh-hant: 此工具設計為最小侵入性。全程使用臨時目錄中的本地 Git 倉庫運作，不會干擾你的專案倉庫（無論使用 Git、SVN、Mercurial 或無版本控制）。若發生意外錯誤，原始碼將自動復原。

segments.source_content: ## How does it work?

translations.zh-hant: ## 運作原理

segments.source_content: The key step is generating a Git patch. The patch contains all the changes made in the React Native templates between the version your app is using and the new version.

translations.zh-hant: 關鍵步驟在於生成 Git 補丁。該補丁包含 React Native 模板從當前版本到新版本之間的所有變更。

segments.source_content: To obtain this patch, we need to generate an app from the templates embedded in the `react-native` package inside your `node_modules` directory (these are the same templates the `react-native init` commands uses). Then, after the native apps have been generated from the templates in both the current version and the new version, Git is able to produce a patch that is adapted to your project (i.e. containing your app name):

translations.zh-hant: 為取得此補丁，我們需要從 `node_modules` 目錄中 `react-native` 套件內嵌的模板生成應用程式（這些模板與 `react-native init` 指令使用的相同）。接著，當原生應用程式從當前版本與新版本的模板生成後，Git 便能產出符合你專案的補丁（例如包含你的應用程式名稱）：

segments.source_content:
```
[...]

diff --git a/ios/MyAwesomeApp/Info.plist b/ios/MyAwesomeApp/Info.plist
index e98ebb0..2fb6a11 100644
--- a/ios/MyAwesomeApp/Info.plist
+++ b/ios/MyAwesomeApp/Info.plist
@@ -45,7 +45,7 @@
        <dict>
            <key>localhost</key>
            <dict>
-               <key>NSTemporaryExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
+               <key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
                <true/>
            </dict>
        </dict>
[...]
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3c08ed05

segments.source_content: All we need now is to apply this patch to your source files. While the old `react-native upgrade` process would have prompted you for any small difference, Git is able to merge most of the changes automatically using its 3-way merge algorithm and eventually leave us with familiar conflict delimiters:

translations.zh-hant: 最後只需將此補丁套用至你的原始碼檔案。舊版 `react-native upgrade` 流程會要求你確認每個微小差異，而 Git 能透過三方合併演算法自動處理多數變更，僅在必要時留下熟悉的衝突標記：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_9f4336b3

segments.source_content: These conflicts are generally easy to reason about. The delimiter **ours** stands for "your team" whereas **theirs** could be seen as "the React Native team".

translations.zh-hant: 這些衝突通常易於理解。標記 **ours** 代表「你的團隊」，而 **theirs** 可視為「React Native 團隊」。

segments.source_content: ## Why introduce a new global package?

translations.zh-hant: ## 為何要引入新的全域套件？

segments.source_content: React Native comes with a global CLI (the [react-native-cli](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-cli) package) which delegates commands to the local CLI embedded in the `node_modules/react-native/local-cli` directory.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 本身配有全域 CLI（即 [react-native-cli](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-cli) 套件），會將指令委派給 `node_modules/react-native/local-cli` 中的本地 CLI。

segments.source_content: As we mentioned above, the process has to be started from your current React Native version. If we had embedded the implementation in the local-cli, you wouldn't be able to enjoy this feature when using old versions of React Native. For example, you wouldn't be able to upgrade from 0.29.2 to 0.38.0 if this new upgrade code was only released in 0.38.0.

translations.zh-hant: 如前所述，升級流程需從當前 React Native 版本啟動。若將此功能實作在 local-cli 中，使用舊版 React Native 時將無法享受此功能。例如，若此升級程式碼僅在 0.38.0 版釋出，你將無法從 0.29.2 升級至 0.38.0。

segments.source_content: Upgrading based on Git is a big improvement in developer experience and it is important to make it available to everyone. By using a separate package [react-native-git-upgrade](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-git-upgrade) installed globally you can use this new code today no matter what version of React Native your project is using.

translations.zh-hant: 基於 Git 的升級方式大幅改善了開發者體驗，讓所有人都能使用這項功能至關重要。透過全域安裝的獨立套件 [react-native-git-upgrade](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-git-upgrade)，無論您的專案使用哪個 React Native 版本，現在就能立即採用這項新功能。

segments.source_content: One more reason is the recent [Yeoman wipeout](https://twitter.com/martinkonicek/status/800730190141857793) by Martin Konicek. We didn't want to get these Yeoman dependencies back into the `react-native` package to be able to evaluate the old template in order to create the patch.

translations.zh-hant: 另一個原因是 Martin Konicek 近期執行的 [Yeoman 移除計畫](https://twitter.com/mkonicek/status/800730190141857793)。我們不希望為了建立補丁而重新將這些 Yeoman 相依套件加回 `react-native` 套件中來評估舊版模板。

segments.source_content: ## Try it out and provide feedback

translations.zh-hant: ## 試用並提供反饋

segments.source_content: As a conclusion, I would say, enjoy the feature and feel free [to suggest improvements, report issues](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues) and especially [send pull requests](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pulls). Each environment is a bit different and each React Native project is different, and we need your feedback to make this work well for everyone.

translations.zh-hant: 總結來說，請盡情使用這項功能，並歡迎隨時[提出改進建議、回報問題](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues)，特別是[發送 Pull Request](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pulls)。每個開發環境與 React Native 專案都有所差異，我們需要您的反饋來讓這項功能更完善。
